152702.「合コンってのは 『合同懇親教練』の略ネ。\n 学園の 歴史ある課外活動らしいん:
Gokon is an abbreviation for "joint get- together training. It seems to be an extracurricular activity with a long history
at the school, but it's too time-consuming, so everyone calls it "Goukon. At Gokon, we form parties with other members of the same class
and beat up tough monsters. And then we work out our minds and bodiesThe monsters are all proper teachers, so don't be afraid. If
there are not 4 companions, we will match you up with other members, so feel free to join us even if you are a solo player!

152703.「合コンに参加するには チケットが必要だよ。\n 購買部で 教練チケットってのが:
To attend the party, you will need a ticket, which you can buy at the school shop under "Training Ticket". The proceeds from the
ticket sales will be used to fund the activities of our party organizers, so please help us and here's the important part! If
one of you has a ticket, you can attend the companion party without a ticket! And here's the thing! The person who has the ticket
becomes the party leader and invites the companion to join the party. The ticket will be collected after a successful victory. Even
if you lose, the ticket will not be lost!

152704.「合コン相手は いくつかランクがあるの。\n ざっくり言うと 相手をやっつける難:
There are several ranks of partners at a party. To put it simply, it's the degree of difficulty of defeating them. Depending on the
rank you choose, the type of Pure Jewel you can take home will also change. Well, I would recommend Bronze for the first timeAt
least! When the season changes, there is a special party called Knight Fest that you can attend without a ticket!

152705.「合コンに勝利すると ピュアジュエルってのが\n もらえるよー。学園で使える装備:
When you win a party, you get a Pure Jewel. It is the motto for making and evolving equipment that can be used at the school! You can
participate solo, but if you participate in a party with other girls from your class, you may be able to take home a little more Pure
Jewel? Yes, you need to be in the same classroom in order to form a party with your group, so please remember that. Let's have a
party and get some cool weapons!

152706.「合コンってのは 『合同懇親教練』の略さ。\n 学園の 歴史ある課外活動らしーん:
Gokon is an abbreviation for "joint get- together training. It's an extracurricular activity with a long history at the school,
but it's a lot of work, so we call it Gokon. At Gokon, we form a party with the same group from our class and defeat tough monsters. The
monsters are all teachers, so there's no need to be scared. If there aren't four companions, we'll match you up with others, so feel free
to join us even if you're solo!

152707.「合コンに参加するには チケットが必要だぜ。\n 購買部で 教練チケットってのが:
To attend the party, you need a ticket, and you can buy a Training Ticket at the school shop. The proceeds from the ticket sales will
be used to fund the activities of our party organizers, so please help us and here's the important part! If one of you has a
ticket, you can join the party without a ticket. That's right! The person who has the ticket becomes the party leader and invites
his/her companion to join the party. The ticket will be collected after a successful victory. Even if you lose, it will not be
lost, so please try your best!

152708.「合コン相手は いくつかランクがあるんだ。\n ざっくり言うと 相手をやっつける:
There are several ranks of partners at a party. To put it roughly, it's the level of difficulty to beat them. Depending on the rank
you choose, the type of Pure Jewel you can take home will also change. Bronze is recommended at first. Also, when the season
changes, there is a special party called Knight Fest that you can attend without a ticket! It's a very badass Knight party where
you can get some cool Jewel by getting a special partner!

152709.「合コンに勝利すると ピュアジュエルってのが\n もらえる。学園で使える装備を作:
When you win a party, you get a Pure Jewel. It's a motto for making and evolving equipment that can be used at the school! You can
participate solo, but if you participate in a party with other students in your class, you may be able to take home a little more Pure
Jewel? Yes, you have to be in the same classroom to form a party with a girl from your group, so remember that. Let's go out and
get some cool weapons!

154774.「ジュエル装備を 作るときは\n こんな錬金効果セットの中から\n 選んだものを:
When you make Jewel equipment, you can choose from the following alchemy effect sets to put on it! You can't change the alchemy effect set
once you decide, so you have to think carefully before you choose! When you evolve your weapon, you will get a higher version of
this alchemy effect! Good luck and make the strongest weapon you can!

154775.「フェスってのは 季節が変わると開催される\n 特別なイベントで ここでしか作れ:
The festival is a special event held every season, where you can get rare accessories that can only be made at the festival. If you
want festival accessories, you should go to the Knight festival and have a lot of fun! And don't worry, Knight Fest will not be canceled
just because the season changes!

154779.「合コンで集めた ピュアジュエルを使って\n ジュエル装備ってのを 作ることがで:
You can make Jewel equipment with Pure Jewel collected at the party, and I will give you what you like from the alchemy effect set
shown hereBut once you decide the alchemy effect set, you cannot change it, so please think carefully before you choose it. This is
very important. You can evolve your Jewel weapon to get a higher version of the alchemy effect. You should make the most powerful
weapon you can!

seasons change!
